resources.string: READ BELOW BEFORE USING!!! Scroll down for instructions/details

"USE AT YOUR OWN RISKS!!! This app requires your phone to be rooted, otherwise it will not work. If you don't know what a rooted phone is, ask Google :-)

This app is meant for people encountering the error message "can't connect to camera". Usually when getting this error message, the only solution for using the camera again is to restart the phone.

This app allows to restart the camera individually without needing to restart the phone.

This app uses root permission to kill the process named 'media' ('/system/bin/mediaserver').

I published this app with the hope that it would be helpful, however I do not know what the consequences of killing the 'media' process are, I just know that it solved my problem.

USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!

HOW TO USE THE APP:
The 'auto launch camera' check box is an app wide preference: if it is checked, upon restarting the camera, the default camera app will be launched.
The 'RESTART CAMERA' button will perform the action of restarting the camera.
The app's widget does the same action as the 'RESTART CAMERA' button, without the need of starting the app.
The best way to use this app is to use the widget: a simple click on the widget and your camera is restarted with the default camera app started!

IF YOU WANT THIS APP WITHOUT ADS:
If you use the widget you will never see ads, but if you really want the app without ads, the source code is available publicly (see the app's Play Store page) so you're free to build an ad-free version for yourself."
\"Auto restart camera action\" is disabled, opening app settings instead.
